name: Field Mapper
description: Create a field representation from collections of bounded curves/lines.

inputs.name: Bounds
inputs.description: Boundary box for the resulting field

inputs.name: Divisions
inputs.description: Sample points spacings for the resulting field (greatest extent in one direction)

inputs.name: Areas
inputs.description: Boundary box for the resulting field

inputs.name: Z Range
inputs.description: Maximum height of the surface field (defaults to 5% of boundary width/height)
